Reviews.Title: “Very nice, comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: summerr106
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great, comfortable, clean hotel to rest and refresh, this one is perfect. It is close to all major college and University campuses in this Florida area as well as the technology park. We were visiting Rollins and UCF. Our room was a King bed suite. It had separate sleeping/bathroom area, and sitting/kitchen area. Two large screen televisionsand a very comfy couch. The kitches is perfect, with full size refrigerator, dishwasher,garbage disposal and stove top. There is a small table for two to dine comfortably or to use as a desk for work. They provide a large breakfast selection in the lobby and a welcome home evening meal that is out of this world. They even say "Welcome Home" when you return later on in the day and evening. The lobby has ample dining tables as well as soft couches and chairs. There is a pool area and patio with umbrella tables to relax. The business center is well stocked and very available with room card access. Everything is very clean and user friendly. There are plenty of parking spaces. Also, there are side and back enterances with room card access so you will not have to be concerned about parking away from the front door. You are always only steps from an enterance as long as you have your room key. The hotel shares a parking lot with Walgreens, so do not worry if you forget anything. The front desk associates will see to your every need while staying there. They provided me written directions to every destination I needed, and provided plenty of hospitality. We were there on personal business and each person we had the pleasure of meeting was very encouraging and supportive.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible staff !”
Reviews.Author: Hipolito_Bouchard
Reviews.Content: The hotel has absolutely clean rooms, with a full kitchen, well decorated, with high speed internet that works at a high speed, a nice pool, a comfortable place for breakfast. The breakfast is complete, well served, and there is free parking around the lot. For us, the best rooms are in the back, far from the street. It has a Walgreen's at one side, so you can shop 24hs for urgent needs. The Staff: Plain and simple: Carolina, at the front desk, was very helpful, doing her best to speak in spanish, and giving us all the help we need. The one thing that impressed us: we stayed just one night because of prior reservations in a Resort nearby. When we checked out, we wanted to pay cash, so we did. The same day I received an email from Chris, who works with Carolina at the front desk, telling me that I gave them an extra $100 bill, asking for my current adress to send a check. This honest behaviour is a rare thing these days...

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: ljandbucket
Reviews.Content: Was in the Orlando area in business and the Homewood Suites was a nice home away from home. The rooms were large with a seperate living area. Beds were comfortable. The hotel also had an expansive free breakfast as well as happy hour with a light dinner and drinks. Overall I'd recommend the hotel based on its location to business in the north eastern Orlando area and it's amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Shaun M
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Feb-3-5th, 2012. We were in town for a Miranda Lambert concert at UCF Areans and this place was very close to the campus. As a value, this hotel is unbelievable. We had a one bedroom suite (415) and the room was immaculate and clean, and had a kitchenette. The staff is very helful and friendly, and your stay includes a buffet breakfast every day, which is incredible. Many choices to pick from as well. If I am ever in the Orlando area again, I will look to stay here first. Its seriously one of the better hotels I have been at in a long time. We even forgot our coats in the closet when we left for the Gulf Coast, which is a bit of a problem since we are from Canada, and the staff made sure to pack them up for us to obntain when we made our way back for our flight home. Thanks to all the Homewood staff! A++ service and A++ hotel!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for my travel”
Reviews.Author: orphan60
Reviews.Content: Had to attend classes at the University of Central Florida..which is 5 minutes away..had rental with free parking at the Suites. The food both morning and eveniings was excellant..saved me going out and spending money. The room which is like an efficiency apartment had everything I needed and then some. Everything worked and everything was clean. Everyone in the staff was friendly and helpful. I've stayed at other Homewood Suites and they always are a good fit for my activities.

Reviews.Title: “Made us feel at home”
Reviews.Author: hellofromjersey
Reviews.Content: We had a family emergency in FL in early Feb 2012, and family members flew in from NJ and NM to be together at the Homewood Suites. Joey Kratt and the staff went out of their way to cater to us and make our visit together wonderful. We hung out by the pool and jacuzzi (I liked the towel closet by the pool), in various rooms (very nice), and put tables together in the morning to enjoy the great breakfast that was included. We were able to savor all the time we had together, and I am so grateful to the staff for making us feel like we were at home for a weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Another Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: bondtk
Reviews.Content: Try to stay at Homewood when I can and this one was just as impressive as most. Staff was friendly and helpful. Everything was clean, spacious, fresh, and inviting. Always enjoy the free breakfast and appreciate the free wifi. They even allowed me a late check out which was greatly appreciated. Thanks, Homewood, for another great stay! Would definately recommend to others and stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, comfortable, clean and courteous!”
Reviews.Author: kalirisin
Reviews.Content: Our stay at this hotel was very pleasant. The staff were consistently courteous and went out of their way to meet all our requests. They were very friendly! The evening reception was wonderful. The breakfast was very good and provided several tasty alternatives. The pool was lovely, large and the enjoyable. Our family traveled with a 12 year old and a 15 month old, and we were very comfortable all around. Our only complaint had to do with cigarette smoke. We stayed on the 4th floor, and every time we approached the elevators, we thought we smelled cigarette smoke. When we asked the front desk, she explained that some rooms on the 4th floor were smoking. We were surprised that such a nice, up to date property would even allow smoking on site? Why are they not a smoke free property, like so many other health conscious hotels these days? So, if you don't like cigarette smoke, stay away from the 4th floor. Otherwise a wonderful stay.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Property”
Reviews.Author: pipatton
Reviews.Content: I first stayed at this Homewood Suites in Nov 2010 and was immediately impressed with the friendly staff and cleanliness of the property. I ended staying three nights on two different occasions in 2010. Now I stayed there again in Dec 2011 and there is just something special about this property. I have not stayed at a finer facility at any price point.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay Near UCF”
Reviews.Author: JASONR123
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for a recent government meeting at Lockheed Martin in East Orlando. As a UCF alumni, I was very happy to return to the area and we had great accommodations at the Homewood Suites. Joey, the group sales manager made the registration process simple for everyone and was nice to work with. The hotel staff was very friendly and both the breakfast and the evening managers reception offered a good variety of food. This is a very nice area of Orlando and offers a variety of restaurants and new businesses. I highly recommend the East Orlando area, much less expensive and less traffic than downtown and I recommend this hotel highly for a business trip or for families. We brought the kids and having the managers reception in the evening really helps with meal costs, although I there are many other great restaurants in the area. Homewood Suites is one of my favorite hotel chains and this one is very nice and appears to be a new hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice from each perspective...”
Reviews.Author: C G
Reviews.Content: ... nice suites with kitchenette, living room, bed room each with a TV and bathroom. We stayed there with a small child for 2 weeks during this summer. There was reason for complaint. The hotel and the room was absolutely clean. The staff was really ambitious to help with any issue or concern. WiFi in the room and also a business room with printer and fax. The pool was also very nice. As a German, the breakfast you get in a hotels are very unsuall as they are unhealthy (lack of fruits and real bred) and often poor in their variety. This hotel had the best breakfast from all hotels we stayed in. Beside that, the room price is very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Robert S
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed a week across Thanksgiving and it was wonderful. Unobtrusive staff, but very helpful when needed. We'll be back everytime we are in the UCF area.

Reviews.Title: “What a great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Debbieroo
Reviews.Content: We were in town for our sons graduation and were so happy we found the Homewood Suites located right next to UCF! It is also close to plenty of restaurants and shopping. From the moment we checked in Chris turned on the charm and was so helpful through out our week stay. He offered us the Graduation Rate even before we asked for any discout. The rooms were always clean, more than accomadating, and so comfortable. Being that we were there with family it was also nice to have a private bedroom in the king suite. The bathroom was very nice and the towels and linens were top notch. The buffet breaksfast was fantastic! The food was great, very good selections and the ladies would help with anything you might need. Imagine my surprise when they even had a buffet dinner on weekdays, free as well. After our sons Air Force Commissioning Ceremony we all enjoyed the pool. There is not one thing I would say bad about this hotel. The staff greeted us any time we came across them and always with a smile.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks to the great staff!”
Reviews.Author: cubanito1
Reviews.Content: My boss needed to attend a last minute event and although there were many choices I saw the reviews and picked this hotel. I called them directly and chris answered all my questions and reserved my rooms. I needed 3 at first, then added another. Chris took care of our group and even upgraded my room due to lack of space. He called me to let me know....who does that? The great people there do. They had a night security guard watch as we unloaded all our vehicles and the free breakfast was a great start to a busy day. Although we only stated one night, the next time we attend a function in Orlando, this place is where we will stay. Rooms clean, campus secure, just really big rooms too.

Reviews.Title: “Close to campus, our home away from home”
Reviews.Author: agrenitz
Reviews.Content: Helpful staff, great breakfast included, clean well-equipped rooms, nice pool area all make for a great stay at this hotel: our home-away-from-home. We usually choose the one bedroom King suite: it has a pullout sofa bed in the living room and a king bed in the bedroom. The kitchen has service for 4, cookware, a full size refrigerator and dishwasher, microwave, and 2-burner cook-top.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Friendly so impressed!!”
Reviews.Author: s k
Reviews.Content: Just stayed in the Homewood Suites UCF this past weekend for the first time. We were greeted at check in by Chris the Front Office Supervisor. Everything went so smoothly. On our first evening at hotel there was a rain storm. We did not have an umbrella and Adrianna -Front Office offered me a umbrella to use for the evening. Wow!! What wonderful service so impressive. The hotel serves a wonderful breakfast. We did not know how to use the waffle maker and another star employee - Phil stepped up to assist us.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SouthFLTraveler
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a business appointment at UCF. The hotel is in a great location and close to the university. The room was clean and the staff was very friendly. I will stay here again on my next visit to the university.

Reviews.Title: “There's No Place Like Home...wood Suites!”
Reviews.Author: JanLanham
Reviews.Content: My husband travels frequently for business. I am so thankful I was able to join him on this trip. What a wonderful experience! He has made it known to his company that he now prefers Homewood Suites. The rooms are clean, beautiful and spacious. The staff is truly amazing. I cannot say enough about how wonderful EVERYONE and EVERYTHING is. I highly suggest you make this Homewood Suites your hotel of choice...you will not be sorry.

Reviews.Title: “Our Great Experience at Homewood Suites Orlando-UCF”
Reviews.Author: BRIAN L
Reviews.Content: I wanted to recognize the wonderful staff at the Homewood Suites on Alafaya Trail here in Orlando. They should be commended, as they are great representatives of your company. I recently relocated here from Ohio for my company and had to utilize the Homewood location on Alafaya Trail for temporary housing for almost two months. It was the most pleasant temporary lodging experience my wife and I have ever experienced. All of the staff were kind, considerate, friendly, tremendously responsive and efficient. They made us feel like it was our home, and after leaving our home in Ohio of almost 25 years, that was a comforting experience. I would like to personally recognize Steffi, Chris, Maria, Larry and Phil, and forgive me if I have forgotten someone, as they all went out of their way to ensure that we enjoyed our stay! Our company utilizes the Homewood Suites for company relocations such as mine, and it is refreshing to know that we are in such good hands. I hope that Homewood Suites can do something to truly recognize these valuable company representatives, as they all deserve it! Thanks again! Brian Lehman Director of Human Resources

Reviews.Title: “Our second, very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: baruth61
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for the second time within the past year. We were impressed by the comfortable, tasteful furniture and cleanliness of the room. It is very convenient that breakfast and dinner was included in our room rate. The menu changes daily and tasted great. Every member of the staff was friendly and greeted us everytime they saw us in the hallway or coming through the lobby. The front desk team provided us with information and directions whenever we needed help. The pool area was very clean and not very busy during the week. We will definitely stay here again when we are back in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but very small suite.”
Reviews.Author: Avlem
Reviews.Content: The suite was lovely - nicely decorated and furnished but extremely small. There was a tiny kitchen. There is a drug store immediately next to this property so you can go and purchase bottled water or snacks which is far more cost effective than purchasing from the little in-house store. We were pleased to have a free dinner offered to us as we checked in. I believe this is offered Monday-Thursdays only. There was also a complimentary breakfast. There are lots of restaurants within a short drive.

Reviews.Title: “I'll be staying here again!”
Reviews.Author: coyotesfft
Reviews.Content: We took a long road trip to look at colleges. We just finished touring UCF and decided to call it a night. We stumbled across this hotel and decided to give it a try. It was a great decision. We felt welcome by the courteous and friendly front staff. Even though we were a walk-in we were quickly checked in. The layout of the suite was very nice. Plenty of room for everyone. The room was quiet and very clean. We just finished unpacking when we received a call from the front desk asking us if the room was to our satisfaction and if they could do anything else for us. We needed food and they recommended a local Italian restaurant that delivered. The next morning we enjoyed a good free breakfast. It's the little details that make a good hotel great and this is one hotel that we will definitely stay at again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Orlando area”
Reviews.Author: Rostino
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at Homewood Suites Orlando. As like our first time, the suite was very comfortable and clean. This hotel is well kept and all employees are helpfull. I would highly recommend staying at this great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “lovely stay”
Reviews.Author: saagartour10
Reviews.Content: the hotel is really nic..it has big clean rooms...we had a room with kitchen...the rooms are raeally nic good n helpful staff....i would really recommend this it also giv free shuttle service to the parks...its very near to the universal studios

Reviews.Title: “Perfect perfect perfect”
Reviews.Author: Lynnburn
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights after a convention, before returning to Australia. I really don't like 5 star hotels, where the service is obsequious and you are charged extra for everything. I also wanted a hotel away from the main attractions and with as few kids a possible. This place ticked all the boxes. Service was warm and friendly. Rooms are all suites with their own kitchen (so no need to eat out alone or have room service), and there is a FREE breakfast and dinner buffet every day. There is a nice pool, the rooms are very comfortable and the place was blissfully peaceful. I cannot fault this place and would always choose somewhere like this in future. They even have free wifi, and a free service for printing things from your smartphone/iPad (airline boarding passes etc)

Reviews.Title: “I was glad my friend suggested I stay here”
Reviews.Author: cindyNE
Reviews.Content: When I knew I was going to be in Orlando on business, my friend suggested this hotel. I'm so happy she did. The breakfast and dinners were great...and the fact that I didn't have to pay extra for them for them was even better. The first night I was here it was beef ravioli, salad and breadsticks. The second night Salisbury steak, whipped potatoes and vegetable medly. I also loved that I could print documents without charge. And of course, the rooms were clean, comfortable and quiet. The staff was also great., Oh and Walgreens is right across the parking lot if you forget any small items

Reviews.Title: “Great value, very clean, excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: carinaMelbourne
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 nights here on our way to Miami & were extremely impressed with the hotel. Plenty of parking, extremely helpful & friendly staff. Very clean and well furnished room. Excellent laundry facilities. Fabulous food with a great breakfast and a surprisingly free dinner too! Free wifi. Fantastic value for money. Just one word of advice. If you like to sleep with your windows open ask for a room away for the main raid as it is very busy and very noisy. Apart from that it was absolutely faultless.

Reviews.Title: “Homewood Suites near UCF is the BEST”
Reviews.Author: RichBethlehemPA
Reviews.Content: I travel throughout the eastern U.S. frequently for business. The Homewood Suites Staff with great people like Emily, Chris, Sherie and too many other great staff members to mention do an amazing job. If you have any problems, they are quick to take action and solve any problems to your complete satisfaction. Frequent guests are greeted by name, room preferences are accommodated, breakfast and evening meals are varied based on guest feedback on new meal alternatives. It is my favorite business hotel and staff. Sincerely, Rich T.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & Great Staff!”
Reviews.Author: amt184
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband travel frequently on business and stay exclusively at hotels in the Hilton family, but Homewood Suites Orlando-UCF area has been outstanding in every way. What sets this hotel apart from the others is that they employ intelligent UCF students to handle front desk operations, meaning they're totally 'with it' and focused on providing excellent customer service. The hotel is super clean, comfortable, decor is attractive, and room layout is functional. You also couldn't be in a better, more central location. There's even a great walk path less than a block away, and a Walgreens next door. Plus, some of the best restaurants in the area, like Giovanni's Italian provide delivery service to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “best staff ever !”
Reviews.Author: JeffandMelCanada
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for a week with my girlfriend, my mother in law and my 5 month baby girl. We enjoyed our stay so much ! The staff at this hotel is so incredible... Every staff member were awesome but most of all, the front desk staff who were so nice with us all week long. They always ask us if we need something more to make us feel at home and they always say hello as we walk by, always smiling. The hotel, lobby, rooms were pretty clean, looks like this is a brand new hotel. The rooms have a small kitchen and the bed are ok. The daily breakfast menu change daily and it's very good. From monday to thursday, they offered us a free dinner (something I didn't know when I made the reservation with expedia.ca). This is the first time I've seen this in a hotel. The dinner was verry good and the menu change everyday too. It includes a salad bar and they even offer free wine and beers ! I highly recommend this hotel for anyone coming to Orlando. It's about 40 minutes from disney parks but it's very easy to get there. it's also about 40 minutes to the cocoa beach. Right next to the hotel, there's a Wallgreen so if you need something, no need to take your car to get there. There's also plenty of shop and restaurant near the hotel. The pool and spa are open until 10pm and I didn't see many kids during our stay so it was very quiet all week long inside the hotel and at the pool. There's also a basketball court right next to the pool. We had a great time here so don't hesitate to go there, you will not be disappointed. best staff I've seen ! Jean-Francois G. Melissa L. Quebec, Canada

Reviews.Title: “Doesn't live up to the hype”
Reviews.Author: brendaSt_Paul_MN
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel based on the rave reviews on Trip Advisor. it doesn't live up to the reviews. The hotel is far from any attraction but is located in a pretty quiet area and is close to shopping and dining. The hotel itself is quiet. To get to Disney will take you about 45 minutes and you will pay a bit in tolls. You also pay tolls to get to the hotel from the airport. The rooms are very small, not what I've had in other Homewood Suites. The closet is a joke and the door won't open far enough to get a suitcase in to sit on the luggage rack. The bathroom and sink area are very small and the sink is open to the bedroom. The beds are uncomfortable and the pillows are like rocks. The sofa and chair are worn out and the decor is unattractive. When we came back after our first day of activities the bed had been made and dirty towels removed, but nothing in the bathroom had been wiped or cleaned and the empty Kleenex box hadn't even been replaced. To give the staff credit, I complained and the rest of our stay the room was nicely cleaned and they left us an apology gift basket. They even dusted the top of the tv armoire which I hadn't mentioned but obviously hadn't been dusted in a long time. The front desk staff is excellent and very helpful. The lobby is attractive. The breakfast is just average. I've had much better at other properties. All in all, this hotel is just average and next time I would pick one more centrally located.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional by far the BEST Hotel we have ever stayed!!”
Reviews.Author: MelissaT925
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at Homewood Suites while we were visiting Full Sail University with our teenage son. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay pleasant and enjoyable. The location was great for what we were in Orlando for. I would like to mention a few staff members that went out of their way to help us. First upon our late arrival, Emily was very nice and professional. Second, Griffin went out of his way to help us with future visits to Orlando. Also the members of housekeeping were pleasant and made sure we had everything that we needed. The breakfast was great and the kitchen staff was as well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I know we will stay here again in the near future. Melissa T. Chesterfield, SC

Reviews.Title: “Nothing stands out, just adequate”
Reviews.Author: rmerje
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a five day stay at this suite hotel. Although nothing was terribly wrong, there was nothing terribly great about this hotel. The room itself was adequate however, everything seemed a little on the small side. The living room, kitchenette, dining area, bath and bedroom were just okay. The bed was comfortable. The daily breakfast was okay. The room service did a nice job daily. The location is a bit out of the way for Disney attractions etc. I think for the money, I would have preferred to spend a little more and get a few more creature comforts. They also need to install flat screen TVs. The hotel opened in 2004, plenty of time for LCD TVs. Also, our 3:30 am wake-up call was 15 minutes late which would have put a crunch on our time had I not wakened myself up at 3:30 am. I also had to call the front desk three times to get an extra luggage rack for the room. It arrived after I asked to speak with the manager.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our Stay”
Reviews.Author: Werner L
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6 nights. The staff was exceptional. The included breakfasts, and the managers evening receptions were better than average. (close to restaurant quality) The location was good, but the trip to Disneyworld was about a half an hour with two stops for tolls. Having Walgreens right next door was a plus. A lot of restaurants since this is a college area. The suite was nice and clean, with small rooms. The mattress was fine. The kitchen was complete and very adequate. The free high speed internet and parking was a big plus. The only downside to us was a very drafty air conditioning system in the living area and an uncomfortable couch. All in all we enjoyed our stay. This is a quality place, but number 1 in Orlando might be an overstatement.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: uclahutton
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the friendly staff, the beautiful room, and the breakfast. I was attending a conference at UCF and this was very convenient and a fabulous value.

Reviews.Title: “You are home when you stay here with best staff, the best breakfast and the best beds”
Reviews.Author: morsebarry
Reviews.Content: On a recent trip to Orlando to visit colleges with my son, we were fortunate to be able to stay at the Homewood Suites From the moment we arrived we knew that we had selected the best hotel. Our room was well equipped, immaculate and comfortable. Having traveled 1500 miles in a short period of time, we were exhausted and it was nice to be able to get a well needed rest in the great beds. My son attests that even the sleeper sofa was comfortable. What a wonderful treat to awaken on Sunday to a beautiful breakfast served so expertly by your incredible staff in the reception area. We found that breakfast was again wonderful every day of our stay in addition to a wonderful evening reception with well prepared food. While at the hotel, we were fortunate to experience the graciousness of Migdalie, Bridgette, Emily, and Chris. In addition, another staff member, delivered and installed the loaner DVD player. He was always helpful and accommodating and even went out his way to make me some cookies as they were closing up the buffet in the evening. Yum! Jeannie, your executive housekeeper made sure that all of our needs were met and that our room was in the best shape. I travel frequently for both business and pleasure and have to tell you that after our stay at your hotel, that we are now spoiled. As we were returning to New Hampshire, the hotels that we stayed in did not pass the Homewood Suite comparison test. I have to tell you that one motels was a supposedly a "5 star" competitor, but could not hold a candle to this Homewood Suites. Each morning we sadly missed our breakfast and the comfort of your hotel! Stephi Voekler and her staff go above and beyond to make guests experience the "home" in Homewood Suites. We will be back often!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay with a group”
Reviews.Author: tomhaas
Reviews.Content: I hosted our company wide annual sales meeting and used Homewood Suites to house and feed our 25 attendees. As with most companies, we had to balance showing our team a first class stay against the reduced travel budgets during these economic times. The sales management and staff at Homewood Suites worked with us to make that happen. We had great meals and a comfortable, relaxing place to unwind after our all day meetings. We now use Homewood Suites as the recommended place for our out of town employees and guests to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I would expect from Homewood Suites”
Reviews.Author: mdhinder
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy staying at Homewood Suites because they have more of a feel of an apartment rather than a hotel. This one had a very nice courtyard area & nice size pool. My room was easily excessible to parking, fitness center, & laundry facilities. I didn't have much interaction with the staff but they were pleasant when I did. My only complaint was you needed to keep your room key very handy because even the doors to the courtyard requires the key to get back into the lobby area. It may be a good idea for them to put their keys on a clip or lanyard so they are always on the guest.

Reviews.Title: “Homewood Suites is always a great value and a nice place”
Reviews.Author: GGWD
Reviews.Content: Typical Homewood Suites, close to UCF Campus and next to a Walgreens. As usual, nice evening reception with Beer/Wine. Decent breakfast, nothing amazing but good food and plenty of it. Hotel, as with all Homewood Suites is a great value, always clean, friendly service. English Speaking housekeeping was a bonus!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: dbloweiv
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel in Novemeber of 2010. I was familiar with the area and was surprised that it was ranked #1 in Orlando (over Disney properties or hotels on I Drive). Don't know if I would rank it that high, however it has a great location, just minutes away from UCF/Research Parkway/Waterford. The hotel was very clean and the front desk was extremely helpful. I had two issueswhen I stayed there. The first was when I called to book the room, I asked for a King, when I got to the room it was a Quenn. I was too tired to complain, and in their defense when I called the 800 number, I was probably talking to someone in India. Second, I was dropped every 5-10 minutes from the wireless internet. SUPER FRUSTRATING. But all in all it was a great hotel with reasonable prices. I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay when visiting KSC”
Reviews.Author: zippeee
Reviews.Content: We were in Orland to visit Kennedy Space Center. This hotel is located on the east side of Orlando in the university area. It is only minutes from the highway and only 25 mins from KSC. Easy to navigate around with ample parking. Walgreens next door is nice. The breakfast was always really good, the best free hotel breakfast anywhere. Our 4 night stay was quite and pleasurable. Lots of restaurants around and the area felt safe to me.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: dragonflytoo
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night for a Pre Cruise hotel This was a very nice hotel, everyone was very friendly and helpful, rooms were clean, pool area was nice an clean with towls stocked outside for you in this little hut. I enjoyed the pool and hubby enjoyed the hot tub, both were kept very nice. They serve a light dinner Mon-Thurs and breakfast buffet daily. Will stay here again if in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Always a good stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Mamasue1
Reviews.Content: With our son being a college student near UCF, Homewood Suites has been our home-away-from-home several times over the past two years. It is obvious the management has high standards - their staff are friendly, courteous and very accommodating, and the place is always clean and orderly, including the dining and lobby areas. On our last visit we were leaving at 6:30 a.m., a half hour before the complimentary breakfast was to be served, but the staff very graciously brought everything out early just to accommodate us - eggs, bacon, potatoes, everything. And their breakfast buffet is really complete, fresh and appetizing. Can't say enough good things about this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: jonmanuel
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel because of all the awesome reviews on Trip Advisor. It was a nice place. A little out of the way, and a couple blocks away from what looked to be not so great neighborhoods, but we never felt any of that element inside the hotel walls... It was also nice having a Walgreen's right next door. Definitely made a couple of trips there. It's a bit of a drive to most of the area's attractions. Be sure to keep your car stocked with quarters to get through all the toll roads! But it did seem like a good place to be based, and the rooms were great. All the amenities you could ask for!

Reviews.Title: “Now I get why it's the 1 ranked in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: weluvsandiego
Reviews.Content: First time at a Homewood Suites..we'll be a repeat customer! Stayed here for 4 nights with my family on June 26. What a wonderful hotel! it was so clean, the staff was nice and helpful,and the breakfast/night reception was yummy! You can tell the staff takes pride in their jobs and where they work. It's close to shopping, food, and highway. We had a king/suite. It was set up nice. The TV could have been more updated though as in flat screen with better volume. 2 sets of elevators, clean hallways, laundry area, computers to use. The only downfall was the hotel was a little out of OUR way and we had to pay a lot in tolls (my fault). Great stay overall!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best Hotel stays I've ever had!”
Reviews.Author: taquilon
Reviews.Content: The Team here realy put it all together at this Homewood Suites. The rooms, facilities, gym, pool and even the food were fabulous. Except for the business that brought me to Orlando, there was no reason to leave the building. I'd stay here again and again. One down side was their internet acces seemed very slow. They promise that will be better the next time I visit.

Reviews.Title: “4 month stay felt like home.”
Reviews.Author: 2ndgnautoxr
Reviews.Content: The staff during my stay was absolutely wonderful. I stayed 4 months in early 2009 for business (government). The only thing I could possibly complain about is the noise right outside my room as I was located near an elevator. On the weekends, being in Orlando, there were usually large groups of younger visitors in the hotel running around being loud. I blame the parents, not the hotel. The breakfast was fantastic and FREE everyday for EVERYONE. Not just a crappy little continental breakfast either. Great food! Also, the welcome home "dinner" was usually pretty good too. The foods were always changing and the staff was always willing to take recommendations. Not to mention the free beer and wine! That's right. Free. Beer. And. Wine. Awesome. I actually never used the pool but the fitness center had a couple treadmills and stationary bikes that were in good condition. The laundry service was usually pretty clean and vacant when I needed to do laundry. Would've been nice if it were free, but not a big deal. The bed...oh man the bed. So comfortable. King size mattress basically swallowed me every single night and was probably the most comfortable thing I've ever slept on. By the end of my stay, the staff knew me by name and treated me like family. I would highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Best run hotel I have ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: jdm428
Reviews.Content: The staff and facilities are hands down the best I have ever seen. I average 80 nights a year in hotels and this Homewood Suites is my favorite. Rooms are clean and very well maintained with a full size stove and refrigerator. Friendly and helpful staff goes out of their way to ensure a comfortable stay for all. There are even two clean gas grills for guests to use by the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!!”
Reviews.Author: SashaTatiana01
Reviews.Content: Kudos to employees Bridgette, Migdalia, Mayra and Sherry in the dining area for the great work they do in supporting all the guests morning and evening. The breakfast and dinner items are always replenished timely. The ladies are very pleasant and always great guests with a smile and a friendly chat. The front desk employees, Chris, Griffin and the young lady in the evening have been extremely accommodating, friendly and professional. In fact, all the employees with whom I've had contact have been outstanding. I travel frequently on business and appreciate great hotel accommodations that are comfortable, clean, friendly and safe. The Homewood Suites on Alafaya Trail in Orlando is my favorite place to stay for long-term visits! Keep up the good work. You truly exemplify the Hilton standard! PR, Alabama

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: tannedon
Reviews.Content: Thanks so much for an awesome stay. We requested a quiet room and boy did they deliver. Breakfast was great, had plenty of choices. The staff could not have been more helpful. Will without a doubt be back. Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: “Homewood Suites Orlando-UCF - a "Feels like home" travel experience”
Reviews.Author: FloridaAgBusTraveler
Reviews.Content: Staff was friendly; and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. Meals were excellent and far exceeded regular "hotel fare" - especially loved the breakfasts! To have opportunity to strike up a game of volleyball; and throw a steak on the grill out near the pool was another nice "piece of home" offered here. Rooms were clean and everything was extremely well maintained - all looks brand new. Appreciated the free copies, faxing, and printing as well as choice of free wifi or wired Internet.

Reviews.Title: “The most friendly hotel in Florida !!”
Reviews.Author: shamberi
Reviews.Content: I have stated at this Hoemwood Suites many times. Each time I like it more. The staff is unusually accomodating and friendly. The breakfast is hot and plentiful and the evening beverages and food is fabulous. I cannot say enough good things about this Hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: odog68k
Reviews.Content: This is a hotel that I would highly recommend to any one for vacation or business. The suites are well kept and provide great amenities during your stay. The staff is always courteous and friend and will go the extra mile to make sure you are well taken care of.

Reviews.Title: “Home Sweet Home”
Reviews.Author: Edddd63
Reviews.Content: Where do I start? Front Desk: Chris, Griff, and Emiliy I received a Super Genuine Welcome. Maintenance: If Larry can't fix it, it isnt broke. Pablo always brings a smile to your face no matter how bad the weather is. House keeping: Nora, My room should be pictured in the next issue of "Home & Garden". Breakfest Staff: Brigitte and Migdalia's breakfest has that touch of a home cooked meal, if you leave hungry for the day, its your fault because you missed out on something good. Evening Reception: Jan and Sherry, Service with a smile, genuine concern on how your day went, and you do not have to worry about washing dishes becauce once you have Sheery's cooken you will leave a clean plate. You cannot get any closer to home with a stay at this Homewood. I know I forgot to mention some of the staff, but with several stays you may become part of the family. Thanks Again for having me. Ed Gotta go it's Lasanga night.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Explicit13
Reviews.Content: Your accommadations were just like Home! Large rooms and the Irons were great as well!

Reviews.Title: “A welcome stay in the UCF area...”
Reviews.Author: tbfamily10
Reviews.Content: Our child attends UCF and we have made several visits this year The area has a number of hotels to choose from but none that offer the value and personal attention provided by Homewood Suites. The hotel is very well-kept. The format of fully-equipped suites is very convenient. We have had the chance to use the pool and recreation facilities making our visits more like mini-vacations! The staff is friendly and goes the extra mile to ensure your stay is perfect - whether providing a requested room or assuring the room is adequate for your needs. The hotel is minutes from the campus and local shopping. While there are many restaurants in the area, with a cooked breakfast and afternoon snacks offered by the hotel, you really don't need to go far!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, no other hotels have compared throughout my travels.”
Reviews.Author: james28hunt
Reviews.Content: The staff is the friendliest you will ever meet. The facilities are excellent and the complementary breakfast is superb. The complementary dinner and drinks Monday through Thursday is great. I recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to the Orlando area. I always try to stay there when my travels take me to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and upkeep.”
Reviews.Author: jlmursch
Reviews.Content: The staff was great. Made every effort to accomodate whatever need I voiced to them. Very easy to talk to. The facility itself is clean, modern, and comfortable. My only real issue is the fact I had to change rooms because of kids staying on the third floor. The parents were on the fourth and apparently left the kids unsupervised because they were running amok. I called in a complaint once and then just asked to change rooms to a different floor. Took about 4 hours from the time the pool closed to the time I got sick of listening to those whelps running up and down the halls and watching TV with their doors open. Very poor parenting. I suggest the hotel keep parents and kids at least on the same floor so that they can be held accoutnable for their spawns actions.

Reviews.Title: “Homewood Suites was quiet, comfortable, conveniently located and extremely accommodating.”
Reviews.Author: Nannurse
Reviews.Content: There are corner rooms tucked around the corner from the elevators that are extremely quiet. The tub/shower and toilet are in a separate room from the sink, which I especially appreciate, particularly when it's really humid outside and my tends-to-frizz hair doesn't need an additional challenge from the bathroom. The hotel is next door to a drug store. Staff were especially helpful when one of our work group became ill and needed to cut her stay short. The lobby is configured for both comfort and privacy. Since I travel every week, I really appreciate having a little extra room to move around in, the full range of cable TV channels, and wireless access that works consistently. And it's one of the few hotels that still delivers a newspaper to the door - an essential part of my waking-up ritual is to read the paper while I drink my coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel experience in my several years of business traveling!”
Reviews.Author: daman002
Reviews.Content: I Really enjoyed my experience at the Alafaya Homewood Suites. The front desk are always smiling and quick to greet customers. The manager of the hotel always tried to make us feel welcome by offering us her I particularly like the hotel restaurant and enjoy utilizing the pool on hot days. I am happy to mention that I reached Gold status by staying with Hilton Hotels and will be sure to remain loyal because of hotels like Homewood Suites.

Reviews.Title: “My home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: ibrlp
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great and the staff members go out of their way not only to accommodate your every need, but to make you feel that you truely are at home. Althought there is not an actual pay as you go restaurant on site, the meals provided at no cost for breakfast and dinner, are full meals and quite tasty.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great place to stay, for business or with family.”
Reviews.Author: Grandy77
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Homewood Suites by Hilton inthe UCF area and have been treated like I was home every time. My colleagues and myself prefer staying here when we are in Orlando, and have considered cancelling our trip when this hotel is not available. From the desk personnel and management that greet you when you check in, to the hostess service at the breakfeast bar and managers reception, to the cleaning and maintenance staff, you are treated with respect and gratitute. The rooms are always clean and sometimes you will find the personnal touch of the maids; we will call it wash cloth art. The hotel is right down the street from the University of Central Flordia and right on AlafayaTrail between University Drive and US Route 50 there are pleaty of options for places to go and eat, and Waterford Center is also right donw the stree. I like having a light diner available if I choose to eat there or also a kitchenette and grills right out ont he patio to cook up your own meal. Because of this Hotel, Homewood is my Hotel of Choice.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home...”
Reviews.Author: katt71123
Reviews.Content: This is my third or fourth time staying at this particular Homewood Suites and I must say each time has been a wonderful experience. The staff are friendly, courteous and always anxious to please which makes our stay that much more enjoyable. I will continue to reserve a room here whenever I visit the area.

Reviews.Title: “The best Hilton Hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: FrequenttravelerinFL
Reviews.Content: I travel for business between 2 to 3 weeks every month. From the first time I stayed at this hotel I was very impressed with their appearance, cleanliness and friendly staff. Now that I need to travel again to Orlando, it was like going back home. Some employees are new, but they are very very friendly and accomodating. The older employees recognized me and they treat me like family. If you are traveling to Orlando, I recommend you this hotel. It is the best hotel in town!

Reviews.Title: “As good as being at home”
Reviews.Author: Homestead_Homie
Reviews.Content: Although located on the outskirts of Orlando, the big attractions in the area are only a short drive away. The rooms are very spacious and well layed out. The kitchenette is certainly designed for those who desire to "cook-in" instead of dining out at the local eateries (which are numerous and with a wide variety). The hotel staff couldn't be more courteous and helful. The free breakfast each morning, exceeds anything that I have experienced at other hotels that I have stayed at. The managers evening hospitality buffet, on Mondays through Thursday, are quite nice and a pleasure when you don't feel like eating out. Overall, this hotel is a great place to stay, short or long term.

Reviews.Title: “Best Homewood Suites In The System”
Reviews.Author: armysimulation
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently in my position with the US Army and normally use Homewood Suites. One or two I will not go back too but the HWS in Oralndo - UCF area is the best I have stayed at anywhere in the USA and this includes other Hilton Hotel chains. A very warm and friendly staff of people providing services are the key to my return to this hotel. From the front desk who greet you ( Chris especially ) to the people who serve the items on the menu, to even the maintenance man (Larry) and the cleaning staff, the services are excellent and they are genuine if you need assistance of any kind ( There's a lot to do in Orlando, believe me). Strongly recommend this hotel to anyone that may visit the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “My favorite place to stay in the UCF area”
Reviews.Author: i-heart-cm
Reviews.Content: I hate to even write this review, because it's already hard to get a room unless you book in advance. I live in Washington, DC, and work in Orlando. Having lived this life for two years, I've sampled every hotel in the UCF area. These days, I go out of my way to make sure I stay at the Hilton Homewood Suites, even calling the hotel directly if our corporate booking system won't let me. :)

Reviews.Title: “Doesn't Honor Reservations - Don't Book Here”
Reviews.Author: SCMAG12
Reviews.Content: Went to Orlando with my Husband and 2 Children for Honors Orientation at UCF. Because we would have 4 in the party - for privacy, and convenience, we wanted a suite. This hotel was close to UCF, advertised that it was a "suites" hotel, AND IT WAS A HILTON HOTEL. We've always had good experiences with Hilton which has the reputation of being a quality chain. I'm a smoker as well, and I know that if you book online, sometimes you're told that room types can't be guaranteed. I called the reservation line and booked a confirmed reservation several weeks in advance, confirming with a credit card. I received confirmation for a King Suite, Smoking for our trip. It was more than an 8 hour drive from our home in Myrtle Beach, SC to Orlando, Florida. When we arrived, we were told by the desk clerk that OUR ROOM WASN'T AVAILABLE B/C A PRIOR GUEST HAD EXTENDED THEIR STAY AND A MANAGER HAD APPROVED THIS. They offered a Queen Smoking suite. Now, I wasn't going to make a big deal about a queen bed verses a King bed and it was a "suites" hotel, so, I was unhappy, but agreed to accept the Queen Suite. Only one problem - when we got to the room, it WASN'T A SUITE. I called downstairs, very unhappy. Was told nothing else was available and they'd let us know when OUR RESERVED ROOM BECAME AVAILABLE. A day later, we still weren't in our confirmed room. When I reaced another employee, we were told we couldn't have our ORIGINAL ROOM BECAUSE A PRIOR GUEST HAD LEFT A SUITCASE IN THE ROOM AND UNDER FLORIDA LAW, IF A SUITCASE IS LEFT IN A ROOM, THE HOTEL CAN'T BOOK IT TO ANOTHER GUEST FOR 2 DAYS. We'd also booked this hotel b/c it advertised on the web site that it had a video arcade - a good amenity when you're traveling with an 11 year old. Problem? False advertising. The hotel doesn't actually have a video arcade. The one time my husband tried to take the 11 year old swimming at the outdoor pool, they found it so dirty that my hubby didn't think it would be safe for my son to swim there. The night before we were to leave we got a call that our original suite was available and the room was right next door to the one we were in. My family was off at Disneyquest for the only "entertainment" we had time for in our trip. There was no point moving for several hours. Also, we'd seen another guest coming and going from the room. GUESS WHICH EXPLANATION WAS THE TRUTH?? I doubted the second one from the get-go because I'm from Myrtle Beach - also a tourist town - and couldn't imagine that the hospitality industry wouldn't be up in arms over a law that allowed a guest to hold them hostage by simply leaving a suitcase behind. I emailed Hilton the night we arrived to tell them we were very unhappy. Hilton did nothing. The hotel never even offerred to book us into another hotel that would offer the accommodation we reserved and confirmed but didn't get at Homewood Suites. Turned out the hotel had nonsmoking suites available. I suggested they move us and that the hotel pay for any cleaning costs to deoderize the room from my "smoking" but they refused to do that. DON'T STAY AT HOMEWOOD SUITS. IN FACT, YOU MIGHT WANT TO AVOID HILTON ALTOGETHER. This hotel doesn't honor reservations and Hilton Doesn't have any honor.

Reviews.Title: “SAVIOR!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: NycSnob
Reviews.Content: This place was FAB!!!! it was not over the top. but it was VERY NEAT AND CLEAN and just what the Doctor ordered. After escaping from the deplorable conditions at the WESTGATE INN VACATION VILLAS in Kissimmie Florida with BED BUGS!!!!!!! It was worth the overpriced last minute rate i was charged!

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Service”
Reviews.Author: Bttrfie
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed at the Hilton in May of '09 and being from Florida we have stayed in Orlando hotels quite a bit but this one was by far the best over all hotel we have stayed at. First: The service was impecable. Words can't even begin to describe how wonderful every single one of their staff members are. They were always friendy and courteous. Second: The rooms are fantastic, specially for families with children (young or old). There was a little kitchenette, spacious living room and super comfortable beds. Third: Delicious breakfast and dinner are served daily at no extra cost. So if you are looking to save this place is perfect for you. Overall this hotel is top notch. We will stay at Homewood Hilton on our trips to Orlando from now on.

HotelInfo.Name: Homewood Suites Orlando-UCF Area
HotelInfo.Address: 3028 N Alafaya Trail, Orlando, FL 32826
